author: SciShow
description:
Go to http://complexlylearnathon.com to check out the Learnathon schedule and support our cool stuff!

Coffee spills more than most beverages. And it all comes down to an unlucky connection between your walking pace, the cup, and that tasty morning brew. 

Hosted by: Madelyn Leembruggen (she/her)
----------
Support us for $8/month on Patreon and keep SciShow going!
https://www.patreon.com/scishow
Or support us directly: https://complexly.com/support
Join our SciShow email list to get the latest news and highlights: 
https://mailchi.mp/scishow/email

title: Your Coffee Mug is a Physics Disaster
